name: Spokesmen Light
short_description:
The Spokesmen Light program is designed as to supplement or begin any COG Spokesmen Club.

Features:
-Timing Light - Either for use as timing light, or guide for changing real world timing light.
-Preset Stopwatch - Preset times for Speeches, Evaluations, Tabletopics, and ability to add requested time.
-Auto-Buzzer - Set to buzz any speaker who goes over their allotted time.
-Built in Flash for use on all OSs.
summary: Digital timing light for COG Spokesmen Clubs.
